subject: Re: [junit] difficulty in Installation of Junit4.5
msgSnippet: Thanks for your reply! The following is what i did .Please suggest!   C: cd junit4.5   C: junit4.5 cd junit4.5   C: junit4.5 junit4.5 set classpath =
messageBody:
Thanks for your reply!
The following is what i did .Please suggest!
 
C:\>cd junit4.5
 
C:\junit4.5>cd junit4.5
 
C:\junit4.5\junit4.5>set classpath = %classpath%;INSTALL_DIR\junit-4.5.jar;INSTA
LL_DIR
 
C:\junit4.5\junit4.5>java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/junit/runner/JUni
tCore
 
C:\junit4.5\junit4.5>java org.junit.runner.JUnitCoreorg.junit.tests.AllTests
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/junit/runner/JUni
tCoreorg/junit/tests/AllTests
 
2.I have another question too.
 
Using Junit ,I have to test the methods of a class in groups.For example,
I have a class P and it has three methods, method int f(string) and the
method float g(int) and the method string h(float), so I have another class testP which has to test the combinations h(g(f("first value from a file"))), h(g(f(h(g(f"first value from a file"))))))
and so on.
 
My testP class should test as many combinations of methods as possible by
composing them automatically.
 
Please need help in this urgently.
 
Thanks,
Sadia
 


--- On Tue, 7/4/09, David Saff <d avid@...> wrote:


From: David Saff <david@...>
Subject: Re: [junit] difficulty in Installation of Junit4.5
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, 7 April, 2009, 9:53 AM






Can you recreate your exact steps? Do you have the string INSTALL_DIR
in your path?

David Saff

On Mon, Apr 6, 2009 at 11:18 AM, sadia tahseen <sadia_in2006@ yahoo.co. in> wrote:
> Ya It is Junit4.5 I could get it installed and tested on eclipse but not on command prompt.It always says classdefnotfound error..even though I set the classpath to directory containing the junit.
>

>> 2.add junit-4.6.jar to the CLASSPATH.
>>
>> For example: set classpath=%classpat h%;INSTALL_ DIR\junit- 4.6.jar;INSTALL_ DIR
>> test the installation by running java org.junit.runner. JUnitCore org.junit.tests. AllTests
>>
>> I did everythg that was asked but i cudnt find org.junit.runner file? and if I using java org.junit.tests. AllTests ,it throws an exception that main class is not defined!!
>>
>>
>> Please help!!
